info.name: Firefox 4 stop/go/reload on the left [Mac]
info.description:
Move the Firefox 4 combined stop/go/reload to the left side of the location bar. This is compatible with the Status-4-Evar extension (version 2011.03.10.18b+).

This version is suitable for the Mac version of Firefox.

The Linux version of this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/38262/
The Windows version of this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/38665/
info.additionalInfo: 03/14/2001 - Split from the Windows version. Yes, I know the screenshots are from Windows,
